about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable journey in Anno Dominis, a captivating open-world survival game that challenges you to explore, build, and survive in a dynamic and ever-evolving landscape.

Explore:

Dive into the vast and richly detailed world of Anno Dominis, where every corner holds secrets, treasures, and dangers waiting to be uncovered. Traverse lush landscapes, mysterious caves, and conquer The Craddle Island, discovering its hidden camps and facing the unpredictable challenges that lie within. Explore together with friends or forge your own path in a world ripe for exploration.

Build:

Shape the world to your vision as you carve out your existence in Anno Dominis. Establish your base amidst the untamed wilderness, constructing fortifications and defenses.

Survive:

Hunt, gather and harvest for food, gather resources to craft essential tools and weapons, and navigate the delicate balance between camaraderie and competition in a multiplayer environment. With the ever-present threat of monsters and the need to maintain your health and resources, every decision becomes a critical step in ensuring your survival in this unforgiving world.

name: Anno Dominis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 / AMD FX-9590 or better
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 2GB / AMD R9 280 better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 980 / AMD R9 Fury
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space

short_description: The World and what once was, is not crumble. The ones who kept sanity are called Virtuos, you as one of them are tasked to survive and discover the secrets of the island, but you are not alone, friends and foes are with you. Do whatever to survive, this place wants you dead.
